name: Minecraft Bedrock Server
long_description: This template deploys a Minecraft: Bedrock Edition server.
cmds: docker run -d --name ${name} ${extra_params} -p ${portmap_19132}:19132/tcp -p ${portmap_19132}:19132/udp -v ${name}-data:/data -w /data debian:latest bash -c "apt-get update -y; apt-get install tmux wget unzip libcurl4 -y; wget -O server.zip ${server_zip}; unzip server.zip; tmux new -d -s minecraft ./bedrock_server; tail -f /dev/null; "
